value.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
value.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

value.title: Implement DNS for Windows Server IaaS VMs
value.excerpt: Implement DNS for Windows Server IaaS VMs

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Update Management to update virtual machines, verify agent connectivity, and use Azure Log Analytics in your cloud environment.

value.title: Replicate and migrate virtual machine servers with Azure Migrate
value.excerpt: Learn the process for replicating, testing, and finally migrating your virtual machines into production.

value.title: Set up Azure Migrate for server migration
value.excerpt: Learn how to check your prerequisite configurations in Azure and in your VMware vSphere environment and then perform the initial steps in Azure Migrate to choose your assessment and migration tools.

value.title: Manage Azure updates
value.excerpt: You'll be able to enable Azure Update Management, deploy updates, review an update assessment, and manage updates for your Azure VMs.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

value.title: Migrate SQL workloads to Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Migrate SQL workloads to Azure virtual machines

value.title: Monitor Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines and hybrid instances
value.excerpt: You'll be able to implement Azure Monitor for IaaS Virtual Machines in Azure, implement Azure Monitor in on-premises environments, and use dependency maps.

value.title: Run parallel tasks in Azure Batch with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Find out about the Azure Batch capabilities designed to help you efficiently run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing applications in the cloud.

value.title: Run a background task in an App Service Web App with WebJobs
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll guide you through creating a WebJob in the same project as an existing Web App and automating tasks with WebJobs.

value.title: How to add and secure a custom domain on your App Service web app | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video, learn about Azure best practices on how to add a custom domain to your web app and how to secure your custom domain with an App Service Managed Certificate.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to deploy your web app in Windows Containers on Azure App Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to deploy your web app in Windows Containers on Azure App Service. Windows Containers that run in an App Service web app provide you with the benefits of Azure like scaling and deployment slots, while still giving you a lot of control over your

value.title: How to easily manage your virtual machine | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this episode of the #Azure Portal "How To" series, learn about the new virtual machine (VM) overview experience, including new ways to quickly get started using your virtual machine.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to find an image for your virtual machine | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this episode of the Azure Portal “How-to” series, learn how to easily find an image for your virtual machine with Microsoft Azure. We’ll show how to get started and how to easily find images you have recently deployed.     Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com  Keep

value.title: How to use Azure App Service managed certificates | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to use Azure App Service managed certificates.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free

value.title: How to use GRUB and the Azure Serial Console on a Linux Virtual Machine | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Tips and Tricks series, Ken from the Azure Serial Console team will show you how to enable GRUB on your RHEL VM. You will also learn how to use GRUB to enter single user mode.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips   Get started with 12 months of free services

value.title: How to work with files in Azure App Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to work with files that you’ve uploaded to Azure App Service. Watch to find out what the different options are for interacting with the file system and your deployed applications in the Azure portal.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Operational best practices for web apps on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure App Service hosts millions of apps, serves trillions of requests per day, and has an SLA of 99.95%. But what should you do when your app has issues in production? Byron Tardif joins Scott Hanselman to discuss some operational best practices for running your web apps on Azure App Service.  0:00
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JAqoLC2dv-M" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build serverless, full stack applications in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to create, build, and deploy modern full stack applications in Azure by using the language of your choice (Python, Node.js, or .NET) and with a Vue.js frontend. Topics covered include modern database capabilities, CI/CD and DevOps, backend API development, REST, and more. Using a real-world scenario of trying to catch the bus, you will learn how to build a solution that uses Azure SQL Database, Azure Functions, Azure Static Web Apps, Logic Apps, Visual Studio Code, and GitHub Actions.

topItems.title: Architect modern applications using Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Break down a scenario for an application and build a multi-service solution based on the microservices approach. Learn how to use modern database capabilities to build a foundation for applications.

topItems.title: Deploy serverless APIs with Azure Functions, Logic Apps, and Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: In the language of your choice (Node.js, Python, or .NET), learn how to deploy an Azure Function that adds real-time data to an Azure SQL Database and triggers an Azure Logic App for notifications, all with GitHub Actions for CI/CD.

topItems.title: Architect full-stack applications and automate deployments with GitHub
topItems.excerpt: In the language of your choice (Node.js, Python, or .NET), deploy an end-to-end solution to solve the real-world scenario of catching the bus. You'll learn how to architect a solution that uses Azure SQL Database, Azure Functions, Azure Static Web Apps, Logic Apps, Visual Studio Code, and GitHub Actions.

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM Identity
value.excerpt: After completing this learning path, you’ll know how to implement identity in Azure. You’ll be able to extend an existing on-premises Active Directory identity service into Azure.

topItems.title: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server
topItems.excerpt: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server

topItems.title: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS Active Directory domain controllers in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS active directory domain controllers in Azure

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM networking
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you’ll learn about Azure IaaS networking and identity. After completing the learning path, you’ll be able to implement IP addressing, manage DNS, and deploy and manage domain controllers in Azure.

topItems.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM IP addressing and routing
topItems.excerpt: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM IP addressing and routing

topItems.title: Implement DNS for Windows Server IaaS VMs
topItems.excerpt: Implement DNS for Windows Server IaaS VMs

topItems.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM network security
topItems.excerpt: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM network security

value.title: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Accelerate and scale a Spring Boot application with Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn what Azure Cache for Redis is, and how to use it with a Java and Spring Boot application. You'll use it to cache some business data using Spring Data Redis, and also to store HTTP session data using Spring Session.

value.title: Work with the Django admin site
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up the built-in Django admin site and configure users for the site.

value.title: Administer and manage Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine remotely
value.excerpt: You’ll be able to select and use suitable tools and techniques to remotely manage Windows IaaS VMs, and restrict administrative connections to those VMs.

value.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

value.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

value.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.
